text:
<!channel> Questions about Project Proposals should be directed to <@U050FMK1S83>, <@U066ED0A4DU>, AND myself. Please also do not notify us when your updates are completed. Our goal is to get through them all by class on Thursday.

If the only thing missing on your proposal is all members listed as contributors, your proposal will still pass. You do, however, need to have your Github Project project management space started, even if that means a link to your existing trello, etc.
